thread.title: Are these Portland's five best bakeries?
thread.title_full: Are these Portland's five best bakeries? | OregonLive.com

author: Michael Russell | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Are these Portland's five best bakeries?
text:
Earlier this week, Travel + Leisure took a stab at naming Portland's best bakeries, or in their words, the five standouts "worth breaking any low-carb diet for."
For its short list, the New York-based travel magazine picked five bakeries, including Loretta Jean's (sic), Roman Candle Baking Co., Little T Baker, Grand Central Bakery and Ken's Artisan Bakery.
So, what do you make of the list? Did they miss your favorite bakery? Let us know in the comments.
-- Michael Russell Follow @tdmrussell
